title: Copies of memorandum and articles to be given to members.
content: 25.- (1) A company shall, on being so required by any member, send to him a copy of the memorandum and of the articles, if any, subject to payment of 0,0854 euros or such less sum as the company may prescribe. 4 of 166 of 1987. (2) If a company makes default in complying with this section the company and every officer of the company who is in default shall be liable for each offence to a fine not exceeding forty-two euros. Issued copies of memorandum to embody alterations.
